CppAD-> Install Introduction AD ADFun preprocessor multi_thread library ipopt_solve Example speed Appendix
Install-> download cmake cmake_check pkgconfig InstallUnix
cmake-> adolc_prefix colpack_prefix eigen_prefix fadbad_prefix ipopt_prefix sacado_prefix cppad_testvector
cppad_testvector
Headings-> Purpose cppad_testvector boost eigen
Choosing the CppAD Test Vector Template Class
Purpose
The CPPAD_TESTVECTOR
template class is used for many of the CppAD examples and tests. If you are going to use boost, cppad, eigen, or std vectors in your CppAD code, you many want to test CppAD with the type of vectors you will be using.
cppad_testvector
The must be one of the following choices: boost, cppad, eigen or std. It specifies which type of vectors are used for the CPPAD_TESTVECTOR template class. The default value for cppad_testvector is cppad.
boost
If cppad_testvector is set to boost, the boost ublas vector
include files must be installed on your system. In addition, cmake FindBoost
module must be able to automatically figure out where Boost is installed.
eigen
If cppad_testvector is set to eigen, eigen_prefix must be specified on the cmake command line.
Input File: omh/install/testvector.omh
